item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.

item.title: Meta
item.description: Colophon Site generated by Hugo, which is great. Unfortunately, Github pages doesn’t grok it, so we have 3 repositories The site itself: Contains the content The theme: Contains the theme (see below) The github pages: Contains the generated files Theme Theme is hyde by @mdo. Ported to hugo by spf13. Additional Modifications by me. You can learn more about the theme here Syntax highting Syntax Highlighting is done via chroma on server.

item.title: Theme
item.description: This site runs a modified version of spf13â€™s hugo port of @mdo‘s hyde theme for jekyll Modifications made: Use \(\KaTeX\) Better date format (Mon, Jan 2, 2006 to January 2, 2006) Have a blog and non blog section Blog sections have dates, non-blog doesn’t Blog uses short list, non-blog doesn’t Home page has content, not blog list No home link in sidebar: The site name above does that Improved Copyright handling: Allow customization of copyright text Add table of contents option Add not_a_list type: This is a list type where the list is actualy a single.
